name: EvoAdventure
description:
I made this game for a highschool project, as an hobby I develop it a little now and then.It is about a slime that fights bad guys with his magical powers.The second level and third are a bit incomplete i need to get more different enemies and work on the boss battles e.e. Also gotta put the number of waves in English

Also a tutorial:

You move with  the keys WASD , your abilities are on QWERT,and if  you press mouse button left you get a wind auto that doesn't spend mana and is fast. You can pick up hearts for hp , blue potions for mana and yellow potions for velocity.
